text: Marriage in Name Only () is a 1930 German drama film directed by Heinz Paul and starring Evelyn Holt, Erika Dannhoff, and Wolfgang Zilzer.Bock & Bergfelder p. 397 The film's sets were designed by Robert A. Dietrich. ==Cast== == References == == Bibliography == * == External links == * Category:1930 films Category:1930 romantic drama films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:German romantic drama films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Heinz Paul Category:German black-and-white films Category:1930 drama films
title: Marriage in Name Only
